name: drawing machine 0.062 0.098 37 22
description:
8192 x 8192 PNG by Johan Karlsson (@DonKarlssonSan).

The path is generated with a digital model of an analogue drawing machine with two spinning wheels that controls the motion of an arm holding the pen. The pen draws on a circular paper that also spins. 

Instead of drawing the path directly, I place points along the path and then draw (straight) lines between the 12 closest points.

This is for the #hen600k event, celebrating 600k mints on Hicetnunc
